meanings.definition: Having a high-pitched and piercing sound.
meanings.sent1: The shrillest whistle pierced through the quiet forest.
meanings.sent2: Her voice was the shrillest in the choir, reaching the highest notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The shrillest alarm clock woke up the entire neighborhood with its piercing sound.
meanings.sent4: The shrillest scream of excitement echoed through the stadium as the winning goal was scored.
meanings.sent5: The shrillest cry of the baby caught everyone's attention in the crowded mall.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched and piercing sound.
meanings.sent1: The teapot shrillest when it reached boiling point.
meanings.sent2: She shrillest in pain when she accidentally touched the hot stove.
meanings.sent3: The cat shrillest loudly when it saw a mouse scurrying across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The microphone shrillest feedback when it was placed too close to the speakers.
meanings.sent5: The bird shrillest to warn its flock of the approaching storm.
